title: Congratulations on Doublewide, Christian
content: Congratulations on [Doublewide](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905213045/http:/typophile.com/ad/redirect/46478/), Christian. The featured face looks double good this week.
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: Very nice! I like this a lot. Good work, Christian.
